Real Student Success, In Their Own Words

These are genuine stories from students and parents who trusted GG Maths. Each journey celebrates hard work, newfound confidence, and the fantastic results that followed.

Book a Free Consultation

Kiran — GCSE & A-Level Achievement

“I was aiming for a 6 or 7. Getting a 9 was a huge surprise and a great achievement.”

Kiran joined GG Maths in Year 10, predicted a Grade 6 in GCSE Maths. With tailored lessons and step-by-step guidance, he turned weaknesses into strengths, achieving a top 2% Grade 9 at GCSE. Carrying this mindset into A-Level, we fast-tracked Year 12 content, giving him extra time for Year 13’s toughest topics. The result: an A in A-Level Maths and a place at university to study Mathematics and Music.

Ben — GCSE Turnaround

“I never thought I’d enjoy maths, but now it’s one of my strongest subjects.”

Ben started Year 11 with a predicted Grade 3 in GCSE Maths. Through focused work on algebra, exam techniques, and weekly practice, his confidence grew rapidly. By exam time, he was tackling past papers with ease and achieved a Grade 7 — a jump of four grades.

Emily — From B to A* at A-Level

“The step from GCSE to A-Level was huge, but I felt supported every step of the way.”

Emily was aiming for a B in A-Level Maths but wanted an A* to secure a place at her dream university. We focused on advanced problem-solving, calculus, and proof techniques, building depth of understanding. She achieved her A* and gained a place at Cambridge.

Matthew — Confidence and Results

“I used to think I wasn’t a ‘maths person’ — now I know I can do it.”

Matthew entered Year 10 struggling with maths and self-belief, predicted a Grade 4. By starting with strong foundations and building up to more complex topics, his confidence soared. He achieved a Grade 8 in GCSE Maths and now feels ready for any challenge.
